description: BrightRock Gold Corp. operates as a lithium exploration company. It holds a 100% ownership and interest in the Midnight Owl Mine with an adjoining 1400 acres and 69 lode claims located to the east of Wickenburg, Arizona. The company was formerly known as Ghana Gold Corporation and changed its name to BrightRock Gold Corp. in November 2013. BrightRock Gold Corp. is based in Gurnee, Illinois.
